Articles.Content: As you wish, it was empty before a battle and if you want to steal tech from my only operational craft model, you can just ask
@Spartwo - Armour is also modular?
No, too part intensive/heavy/ugly/ports everywhere/complicated.
So that armour must be far from being full as there must be the way to put things inside, right?
Do modular ships tend to rip apart easily? Judging by how they are built they sound like they do.
Also, about changing colours, I'll change mine to Yellow and Black.

Okay, so with the introduction of the Majestic Class Carrier, the Difficult-to-use Goliath class has been made obsolete, therefore it only made sense to turn it into a 304 part Battlecruiser! Really though she is extremely effective in long and close range combat, her hanger has been filled with fuel and weapons and certain parts of her armour have been strengthened. EveÃ¢â‚¬â€¹ryone, meet 'Fearless' Britannia weaponry's newest Ship-of-the-line.

Edited May 8, 2014 by Megalodon 720

Do modular ships tend to rip apart easily? Judging by how they are built they sound like they do.

Not quite sure yet. I just built it and haven't sent up a test ship yet.
I'm guessing they are partcount intensive when compared to single module ships, also what are the advantages over single module ships?
Part Count is just above 300.
That's not too high actually.
Lots of struts.
Oh, I would've thought most of the parts would be in the docking ports and such.

So I made this:

Any ideas on how to name it?

It weighs 104t, contains 457 parts (mainly because of ammo) and is really heavy armed and armored

Edited May 8, 2014 by Tarzan
Not sure, she's a good looking ship though.
Someone made a new multiplayer plugin and it seems simpler than KMP. Does this mean we can possibly have battles in real time?
Really? That sounds pretty cool but I prefer the chess style battles.

Someone made a new multiplayer plugin and it seems simpler than KMP. Does this mean we can possibly have battles in real time?

KMP isn't very confusing though.
I find KMP extremely annoying, it's just my opinion.

So I made this:

http://i.imgur.com/jlosZ8z.png

Any ideas on how to name it?

It weighs 104t, contains 457 parts (mainly because of ammo) and is really heavy armed and armored

Why not name it after what you want it to do, my latest ship was named 'fearless' because I wanted it to take on and defeat almost any ship.
The DMP plugin looks cool; if it works well... I'd battle using it. However, it still remains to be seen if it works better than KMP.

Name it "Shere Khan" lol

"Shere khan" was supposed to be the name of one of my ships in next battle, along with Kerchak I try to stick to naming ship classes after marine life forms, and actual ships after movie/book characters
